name: Twin Thunders Master
prerequisiteFormula: (@race:dwarf OR @race:gnome) AND @ability:defensive_training AND ((@feat:improved_two_weapon_fighting AND @feat:two_weapon_fighting) OR @ability:flurry_of_blows#unchained_monk) AND @feat:twin_thunders AND @feat:twin_thunders_flurry AND @feat:weapon_focus#selected_weapon AND @bab >= 9
descriptionText: With thunderous simultaneous strikes, you can batter a mighty giant into submission.
benefitText: Whenever you deal an opponent extra damage with the Twin Thunders feat, that opponent is shaken for 1 round. You also force that opponent to succeed at a Fortitude saving throw (DC 10 + half your level + your Str modif ier) or become staggered for 1 round. If you use this feat to render staggered an opponent that is already staggered, you daze that opponent instead. In a similar way, you can stun an opponent that is already dazed.
